body: Hi All, I am getting this new error from my Run daylight Simulation Component. I am only testing grid based simulation for a simple box and this is the baloon answer. Can someone help me? thanks in advance David[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/METBy5Dkt9sd96dYGcp4XQBHGh8lSQBeZzZay9paZqxa**rayT65XvM9MIqCqEl398H2ID7hjGdBht2FMMWYSYJ*XzvfZU4P/Fatalerror.png)

replies.body:
DAvid,

You need to connect (and define) one of the sky types provided in HB. You are connecting an EPW file to the Grid analysis instead.

-A.

Thanks you Abraham. It is a stupid error :)

D.
